isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL TANDEM AXLE FORWARD REAR DRIVE UNITS - INSTALL - Input Shaft Assembly

note.para: The shim pack under the input bearing cage is installed after the end play of the input bearing is checked and adjusted.

step1.para: Position the differential carrier housing in a repair stand so that the ring gear is facing downward.

Put the clutch collar in the differential carrier housing so that the teeth on the outside of the collar are toward the input yoke. Install the clutch collar onto the shift fork so tabs of the fork fit into the slot of the clutch collar.
Install the rear side gear and bearing assembly through the clutch collar and into the differential carrier housing ( Figure 146).

figure.caption: Figure 146. Install Rear Side Gear and Bearing Assembly

step1.para: Make sure that the painted alignment marks on the teeth of the helical gears are visible during the installation of the input shaft assembly ( Figure 147).
Connect a lifting device to the input yoke. Lift the input shaft assembly over the bore in the differential carrier.
On 160 Series carriers, rotate the inter-axle differential case so that one of the notches on the case is aligned with the helical driven gear in the carrier ( Figure 148).
Lower the input shaft assembly into the differential carrier ( Figure 149).

figure.caption: Figure 149. Lower Input Shaft Assembly into Differential Carrier
